name: Where Are My Friends? (itch)
description:
The first memory you have is waking up in the factory where you were made. The next memory you have is two hands putting you in a box. Now that box seems to have fallen off the back of a truck. You managed to escape the box, but can you find your way back to your friends?

As you navigate the harsh terrain, you must borrow parts from other robots, 'joining' their parts to you in order to progress. If you succeed, you will once again be 'joined together' with your friends!

Use arrow keys to move, mouse to select, Spacebar to attack, and 'e' for dialog.
